subject: Cable plug type.
description_text:
Dear Simsonn team!

I ordered a Simsonn pro x ultra pedal set with VAM pro linear motor and I
would like to ask what kind of power cable it will be shipped with? EU plug
or another type?
If it's not a EU plug, what kind of cable should I buy?

Thank you for your answer in advance.

Janos Lauer

conversations.body_text: Hi Lauer JÃ¡nos,    We shall include the appropriate power adapter for your purchase location, so rest assured that the EU will dispatch the European-standard version.
